Headline: Howard bound Yellow  Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an  earlier delay at Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an  earlier delay at Skokie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
